00019 #ifdef __cplusplus
00020 extern "C" {
00021 #endif
00022 
00023 #define msg(label, err, ...) label( err, __VA_ARGS__ )
00024 #define msg_noargs(label, err, literal) label( err, "%s", literal)
00025 
00042 #define msg_err(label, ...) \
00043     do { msg(label, 0, __VA_ARGS__); goto err; } while(0)
00044 
00054 #define msg_if(label, expr) do { if( expr ) \
00055     msg_noargs(label, 0, #expr); } while(0)
00056 
00064 #define msg_ifm(label, expr, ...) \
00065     do { if(expr) { msg(label, 0, __VA_ARGS__); } } while(0);
00066 
00081 #define msg_ifb(label, expr) \
00082     if( (expr) && (msg_noargs(label, 0, #expr) ? 1 : 1) ) 
00083 
00094 #define msg_return_if(label, expr, err) msg_ifb(label, expr) { return err; }
00095 
00104 #define msg_return_ifm(label, expr, err, ...) \
00105     if(expr) { msg(label, 0, __VA_ARGS__); return err; }
00106 
00115 #define msg_return_sifm(label, expr, err, ...) \
00116     if(expr) { msg(label, errno, __VA_ARGS__); return err; }
00117 
00125 #define msg_return_sif(label, expr, err) \
00126     do { if(expr) { msg_noargs(label, errno, #expr); return err; } } while(0)
00127 
00135 #define msg_goto_if(label, expr, gt) msg_ifb(label, expr) goto gt
00136 
00144 #define msg_err_if(label, expr) do { msg_ifb(label, expr) { goto err;} } while(0)
00145 
00154 #define msg_err_rcif(label, expr, errcode) \
00155     do { msg_ifb(label, expr) { rc = errcode; goto err;} } while(0)
00156 
00163 #define msg_err_ifm(label, expr, ...) \
00164     do { if( (expr) ) { msg(label, 0, __VA_ARGS__); goto err; } } while(0)
00165 
00172 #define msg_err_sif(label, expr) \
00173     do { if(expr) { msg_noargs(label, errno, #expr); goto err; } } while(0)
00174 
00182 #define msg_err_sifm(label, expr, ...) \
00183     do { if((expr)) { msg(label, errno, __VA_ARGS__);  goto err; } } while(0)
00184 
00185 
00187 #ifdef OS_WIN
00188 #define msg_strerror(label, en)                                     \
00189     do {                                                            \
00190         LPVOID lpMsgBuf = NULL;  DWORD dw = GetLastError();         \
00191         if(FormatMessage( FORMAT_MESSAGE_ALLOCATE_BUFFER |          \
00192             FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_SYSTEM, NULL, dw,                   \
00193             MAKELANGID(LANG_NEUTRAL, SUBLANG_DEFAULT),              \
00194             (LPTSTR) &lpMsgBuf, 0, NULL ) && lpMsgBuf)              \
00195         {                                                           \
00196             msg(label, 0, "%s", lpMsgBuf);                          \
00197             LocalFree(lpMsgBuf);                                    \
00198         }                                                           \
00199     } while(0)
00200 #else
00201 
00202 #define msg_strerror(label, en)                                     \
00203     do {                                                            \
00204         enum { _DBG_BUFSZ = 256 };                                  \
00205         char _eb[_DBG_BUFSZ] = { 0 };                               \
00206         if(u_strerror_r(en, _eb, _DBG_BUFSZ)) {                     \
00207             msg(label, 0, "strerror_r(%d, ...) failed", en);        \
00208         } else {                                                    \
00209             msg(label, 0, "errno: %d (%s)", errno, _eb);            \
00210         }                                                           \
00211     } while(0)  
00212 
00213 #endif /* ! def OS_WIN */
00214 
00219 /* nop_ macros */
00220 #define nop_return_if(expr, err)       do { if(expr) return err; } while(0)
00221 #define nop_err_if(expr)               do { if(expr) goto err;   } while(0)
00222 #define nop_goto_if(expr, gt)          do { if(expr) goto gt;    } while(0)

00226 #define con_err(...)                    msg_err(con_, __VA_ARGS__)

00228 #define con_if(expr)                    msg_if(con_, expr) 
00229 #define con_ifm(expr, ...)              msg_ifm(con_, expr, __VA_ARGS__) 
00230

00232 #define con_return_sif(expr, err)       msg_return_sif(con_, expr, err)

00234     msg_return_ifm(con_, expr, err, __VA_ARGS__)
00235 #define con_return_sifm(expr, err, ...) \
00236     msg_return_sifm(con_, expr, err, __VA_ARGS__)
00237

00411 /* dbg_ macros */
00412 #ifdef DEBUG
00413     #define dbg(...)                    msg(dbg_, 0, __VA_ARGS__)
00414     #define dbg_err(...)                msg_err(dbg_, __VA_ARGS__)
00415 
00416     #define dbg_if(expr)                msg_if(dbg_, expr) 
00417     #define dbg_ifb(expr)               msg_ifb(dbg_, expr)
00418     #define dbg_ifm(expr, ...)          msg_ifm(dbg_, expr, __VA_ARGS__) 
00419 
00420     #define dbg_return_if(expr, err)    msg_return_if(dbg_, expr, err)
00421     #define dbg_return_sif(expr, err)   msg_return_sif(dbg_, expr, err)
00422     #define dbg_return_ifm(expr, err, ...)      \
00423         msg_return_ifm(dbg_, expr, err, __VA_ARGS__)
00424     #define dbg_return_sifm(expr, err, ...)      \
00425         msg_return_sifm(dbg_, expr, err, __VA_ARGS__)
00426 
00427     #define dbg_err_if(expr)            msg_err_if(dbg_, expr)
00428     #define dbg_err_sif(expr)           msg_err_sif(dbg_, expr)
00429     #define dbg_err_ifm(expr, ...)      msg_err_ifm(dbg_, expr, __VA_ARGS__)
00430     #define dbg_err_sifm(expr, ...)     msg_err_sifm(dbg_, expr, __VA_ARGS__)
00431     #define dbg_err_rcif(expr, ...)     msg_err_rcif(dbg_, expr, __VA_ARGS__)
00432 
00433     #define dbg_goto_if(expr, gt)       msg_goto_if(dbg_, expr, gt)
00434     #define dbg_strerror(err)           msg_strerror(dbg_, err)
00435 
00436     /* simple debugging timing macros */
00437     #define TIMER_ON \
00438         time_t _t_beg = time(0), _t_prev = _t_beg, _t_now; int _t_step = 0
00439     #define TIMER_STEP                                                      \
00440         do {                                                                \
00441         _t_now = time(0);                                                   \
00442         dbg("  step %u: %u s (delta: %u s)",                                \
00443             _t_step++, _t_now - _t_beg, _t_now - _t_prev);                  \
00444             _t_prev = _t_now;                                               \
00445        } while(0)
00446     #define TIMER_OFF  dbg("elapsed: %u s", (time(0) - _t_beg))
00447 #else /* disable debugging */
00448     #include <ctype.h>
00449     /* this will be used just to avoid empty-if (and similar) warnings */
00450     #define dbg_nop()                   isspace(0)
00451     #define dbg(...)                    dbg_nop()
00452     #define dbg_err(...)                do { goto err; } while(0)
00453 
00454     #define dbg_if(expr)                do { if( (expr) ) { ; } } while(0)
00455     #define dbg_ifb(expr)               if( (expr) )
00456     #define dbg_ifm(expr, ...)          do { if( (expr) ) { ; } } while(0)
00457 
00458     #define dbg_return_if(expr, err)    do { if( (expr) ) return err; } while(0)
00459     #define dbg_return_sif(expr, err)   dbg_return_if(expr, err)
00460     #define dbg_return_ifm(expr, err, ...)      \
00461         dbg_return_if(expr, err);
00462     #define dbg_return_sifm(expr, err, ...)     \
00463         dbg_return_if(expr, err);
00464 
00465     #define dbg_err_if(expr)            do { if( (expr) ) goto err; } while(0)
00466     #define dbg_err_sif(expr)           do { if( (expr) ) goto err; } while(0)
00467     #define dbg_err_ifm(expr, ...)      do { if( (expr) ) goto err; } while(0)
00468     #define dbg_err_sifm(expr, ...)     do { if( (expr) ) goto err; } while(0)
00469     #define dbg_err_rcif(expr, errcode, ...)    \
00470         do { if( (expr) ) { rc = errcode; goto err; } } while(0)
00471 
00472     #define dbg_goto_if(expr, gt)       do { if( (expr) ) goto gt; } while(0)
00473     #define dbg_strerror(err)           dbg_nop()
00474     #define TIMER_ON
00475     #define TIMER_STEP
00476     #define TIMER_OFF
00477 #endif /* ifdef DEBUG */
